name: Princess of Burundi
description:
The underwater world is intriguing and fascinating. The amount of its inhabitants amazes and the number of colors shocks. Feel the atmosphere of the sea adventures, deep feats and pelagic discoveries. Dive into the world where beautiful Princess of Burundi is living.

The game has two modes: underwater relax and the sea adventure. Don't let lustful male approach the princess - turn them into harmless butterflies. But be careful! The underwater world is very diverse...

FEATURES:

* The beauty of the underwater world
* ABILITY TO BLOW UP FUGU-FISH
* Annoying squids
* Relaxing music
* Relax mode

CREDITS:

Yaroslav Bezruchko, Alexander Karpenko

Sounds: freesound.org
